article.title: Favourite Spots in NYC
article.author: Eric Bai
article.excerpt: There's still so many neighbourhoods I need to explore more, and I'll keep updating this list as I do.

authors.bio: A Canadian software engineer in New York. I watch a lot of movies.
authors.name: Eric Bai

next.title: How GDPR Helped Make My Side Project Possible
next.author: Eric Bai
next.excerpt: In my last post, I shared my first data viz project, ChatStats. Here I'll share a behind-the-scenes story about how the EU's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) allowed me to create ChatStats.
